parameters:
\bustMoveTo[2, -100, 720, 30]\nc<Senpai>Well done, Saki. Thanks to you, our company scored the
highest points. I knew I could count on you.

\nc<Senpai>I'll write the report, so go take a shower, Saki. And don't
you dare get any semen on my beloved car, okay?

\nc<Saki>That's harsh, Senpai... But it's true that we finished in
just two hours.
\nc<Senpai>You must be happy to have some overtime work, right?

\nc<Senpai>I'm just kidding. I've arranged for you to have a little
break today, so go ahead and take that shower quickly.
